img_summary: This image depicts the **Xiang River Goddess Gourd**, a **Legendary-tier item** from the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The gourd features intricate designs and is associated with providing **Burn Resistance** and **immunity to lava-covered terrain** for a limited time when used. It can be found in **The Webbed Hollow** near the **Verdure Bridge Shrine**, where players must follow a specific path to locate a group of chests containing this item. The image serves to visually represent this key in-game item and its lore.
